unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Geometric Exact Value
question_text:
Suppose a $75\%$ accuracy free-throw shooter attempts free throws until one is missed.
What is the probability that the shooter’s first miss is on the fourth attempt?
solution:
In this situation, the shooter must make three shots, and then miss the fourth. Each free-throw attempt is independent of the previous, so the probability of making the shot is 75% each time. Conversely, there is a 25% chance that he will miss.

P(Score, Score, Score, Miss)

=0.75∗0.75∗0.75∗0.25

=0.1054

Thus, the correct answer is Choice 'A'.
